
### self-replicating malware



* attacker's problem: <br>getting malware to <em>run where they want</em>
* some options: 
<hr class="vspace" />
* connect to machine and install it there
* send to someone
* convince someone else to send it to someone

::: {.myoverbox .big .fragment}

all these options --- automatable

:::

### kinds of self-replicating malware

* [viruses --- hides in <em>other programs</em> (or libraries)]{.fragment .custom .myem-only fragment-index=2}
* worms --- self-replicating malicious programs
* trojans --- useful-looking program that also is malicious
